greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Third coordinate in a barycentric coordinate system of the points of a counterclockwise spiral on an hexagonal grid. First and second coordinates are given in A307011 and A307012.
comment: The third coordinate makes a 120 degree angle with the first coordinate and a 60 degree angle with the second coordinate.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10092
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Mar 19 2019
